meanings.definition: Enclosed in a sheath or covering.
meanings.sent1: The thecate flower bud was safely protected by its green sheath.
meanings.sent2: The thecate caterpillar was hidden inside its silky cocoon.
meanings.sent3: The thecate pencil sharpener kept the sharp blade safely covered.
meanings.sent4: The thecate knight was armored in a shining metal sheath.
meanings.sent5: The thecate seed was snugly wrapped in its protective casing.

meanings.definition: Having a protective covering or sheath.
meanings.sent1: The thecate phone case shielded the device from damage.
meanings.sent2: The thecate turtle retreated into its hard shell for protection.
meanings.sent3: The thecate umbrella kept the raindrops at bay with its cover.
meanings.sent4: The thecate book was kept safe in its leather binding.
meanings.sent5: The thecate armor defended the warrior in battle.

meanings.definition: Covered or protected by a sheath.
meanings.sent1: The thecate sword was securely held in its scabbard.
meanings.sent2: The thecate cable was shielded by its plastic covering.
meanings.sent3: The thecate banana was kept fresh in its peel.
meanings.sent4: The thecate wire was insulated by its rubber casing.
meanings.sent5: The thecate hose was coiled up in its protective sleeve.
